verses.roman:
kvacid bhūmau kvacid vyomni
giri-mūrdhni jale kvacit
alāta-cakra-vad bhrāmyat
saubhaṁ tad duravasthitam

synonyms: kvacit—at one moment; bhūmau—on the earth; kvacit—at one moment; vyomni—in the sky; giri—of a mountain; mūrdhni—on the top; kvacit—at one moment; alāta-cakra—a whirling firebrand; vat—like; bhrāmyat—wandering; saubham—Saubha; tat—that; duravasthitam—never remaining in one place.
translation: From one moment to the next the Saubha airship appeared on the earth, in the sky, on a mountain peak or in the water. Like a whirling, flaming baton, it never remained in any one place.
